detectors.description:
Reentrancy in TakeBack.takeBack(uint256,uint256,bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#145-164):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_user,_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#159)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userToNonce[_user] += 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#162)

detectors.description: TakeBack.claimTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#173-184) ignores return value by token.transfer(owner,balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#181)

Reentrancy in TakeBack.claimTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#173-184):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#180)
	- token.transfer(owner,balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#181)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ClaimedTokens(_token,owner,balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TakeBack.sol#183)
